name: Code: FATE
description:
Earth is hit by horrible alien creatures! They have the ability to control the causality, and the human army is steadily losing ground!

Time to save the day! Control the only prototype mecha: FATE with the ability to change destiny! Good luck, pilot!

How to play:

At the beginning of each turn, your energy will regenerate.

Each part of your mecha will consume maintaining energy each turn.

Each turn has 4 phases:

  1. Enemy moving phase
  2.  Player moving phase: You'll have to decide how much energy to put into moving. How far you can move depends on the existing parts of your mecha.
  3. Player attacking phase: You'll have to choose what weapon and gears to use. And then choose targets in one go. Some attack needs to charge before use. And notice that your weapon will perform differently at different distances.
  4. Enemy attacking phase

In the game, there is a special resource called "fate fuel". When choosing attacks, you can decide how much to use to give it a boost on hit rate! After each hit attack, you can decide to change this attack into "fate fuel".

With it, you can even make impossible attacks to hit! Use it wisely!

(Anyway, I really made this game too complicated... Hope you can find some fun!)
